players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Charlie was a good guy, I'm sad to see him go."
Bob: "I saw Charlie last night, and he seemed fine. I don't know what happened to him."
Diana: "I'm a bit worried about Charlie's death, I think we should all be careful tonight."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
